title: didnt get capsule for lvl up
body: got lvl 240 and it didnt give me a capsule pretty bumbed out about it tbh because im trying to get every champ unlocked by next year

replies.body: Restart your client and/or wait a few hours. Sometimes hextech loot is just a touch delayed.

didn't work.
i tryed that and played another game.
next day loggon still no capsule

Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll be able to track down exactly when you ~~redeemed~~ earned the capsule and match it to what you have in your hextech atm.
